west_of_house.name: West of House
west_of_house.description_original: You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

stone_barrow.name: Stone Barrow
stone_barrow.description_original: You are standing in front of a massive barrow of stone. In the east face is a huge stone door which is open. You cannot see into the dark of the tomb.

north_of_house.name: North of House
north_of_house.description_original: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded up. To the north a narrow path winds through the trees.

south_of_house.name: South of House
south_of_house.description_original: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded.

east_of_house.name: Behind House
east_of_house.description_original: You are behind the white house. A path leads into the forest to the east. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

forest_1.name: Forest
forest_1.description_original: This is a forest, with trees in all directions. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.

forest_2.name: Forest
forest_2.description_original: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around.

mountains.name: Forest
mountains.description_original: The forest thins out, revealing impassable mountains.

forest_3.name: Forest
forest_3.description_original: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around.

path.name: Forest Path
path.description_original: This is a path winding through a dimly lit forest. The path heads north-south here. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands at the edge of the path.

up_a_tree.name: Up a Tree
up_a_tree.description_original: You are about 10 feet above the ground nestled among some large branches. The nearest branch above you is above your reach.

grating_clearing.name: Clearing
grating_clearing.description_original: You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on all sides. A path leads south.

clearing.name: Clearing
clearing.description_original: You are in a small clearing in a well marked forest path that extends to the east and west.

kitchen.name: Kitchen
kitchen.description_original: You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. A passage leads to the west and a dark staircase can be seen leading upward. A dark chimney leads down and to the east is a small window which is open.

attic.name: Attic
attic.description_original: This is the attic. The only exit is a stairway leading down.

living_room.name: Living Room
living_room.description_original: You are in the living room. There is a doorway to the east, a wooden door with strange gothic lettering to the west, which appears to be nailed shut, a trophy case, and a large oriental rug in the center of the room.

cellar.name: Cellar
cellar.description_original: You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passageway leading north, and a crawlway to the south. On the west is the bottom of a steep metal ramp which is unclimbable.

troll_room.name: The Troll Room
troll_room.description_original: This is a small room with passages to the east and south and a forbidding hole leading west. Bloodstains and deep scratches (perhaps made by an axe) mar the walls.

east_of_chasm.name: East of Chasm
east_of_chasm.description_original: You are on the east edge of a chasm, the bottom of which cannot be seen. A narrow passage goes north, and the path you are on continues to the east.

gallery.name: Gallery
gallery.description_original: This is an art gallery. Most of the paintings have been stolen by vandals with exceptional taste. The vandals left through either the north or west exits.

studio.name: Studio
studio.description_original: This appears to have been an artist's studio. The walls and floors are splattered with paints of 69 different colors. Strangely enough, nothing of value is hanging here. At the south end of the room is an open door (also covered with paint). A dark and narrow chimney leads up from a fireplace; although you might be able to get up it, it seems unlikely you could get back down.

maze_1.name: Maze
maze_1.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze_2.name: Maze
maze_2.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze_3.name: Maze
maze_3.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze_4.name: Maze
maze_4.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

dead_end_1.name: Dead End
dead_end_1.description_original: You have come to a dead end in the maze.

maze_5.name: Maze
maze_5.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike. A skeleton, probably the remains of a luckless adventurer, lies here.

dead_end_2.name: Dead End
dead_end_2.description_original: You have come to a dead end in the maze.

maze_6.name: Maze
maze_6.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze_7.name: Maze
maze_7.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze_8.name: Maze
maze_8.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

dead_end_3.name: Dead End
dead_end_3.description_original: You have come to a dead end in the maze.

maze_9.name: Maze
maze_9.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze_10.name: Maze
maze_10.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze_11.name: Maze
maze_11.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

grating_room.name: Grating Room
grating_room.description_original: You are in a small room near the maze. There are twisty passages in the immediate vicinity.

maze_12.name: Maze
maze_12.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

dead_end_4.name: Dead End
dead_end_4.description_original: You have come to a dead end in the maze.

maze_13.name: Maze
maze_13.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze_14.name: Maze
maze_14.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze_15.name: Maze
maze_15.description_original: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

cyclops_room.name: Cyclops Room
cyclops_room.description_original: This room has an exit on the northwest, and a staircase leading up.

strange_passage.name: Strange Passage
strange_passage.description_original: This is a long passage. To the west is one entrance. On the east there is an old wooden door, with a large opening in it (about cyclops sized).

treasure_room.name: Treasure Room
treasure_room.description_original: This is a large room, whose east wall is solid granite. A number of discarded bags, which crumble at your touch, are scattered about on the floor. There is an exit down a staircase.

reservoir_south.name: Reservoir South
reservoir_south.description_original: You are in a long room on the south shore of a large lake, far too deep and wide for crossing.

reservoir.name: Reservoir
reservoir.description_original: You are on the lake. The water is cold and murky.

reservoir_north.name: Reservoir North
reservoir_north.description_original: You are in a long room on the north shore of a large lake, far too deep and wide for crossing.

stream_view.name: Stream View
stream_view.description_original: You are standing on a path beside a gently flowing stream. The path follows the stream, which flows from west to east.

in_stream.name: Stream
in_stream.description_original: You are on the gently flowing stream. The upstream route is too narrow to navigate, and the downstream route is invisible due to twisting walls. There is a narrow beach to land on.

mirror_room_1.name: Mirror Room
mirror_room_1.description_original: You are in a large square room with tall ceilings. On the south wall is an enormous mirror which fills the entire wall. There are exits on the other three sides of the room.

mirror_room_2.name: Mirror Room
mirror_room_2.description_original: You are in a large square room with tall ceilings. On the south wall is an enormous mirror which fills the entire wall. There are exits on the other three sides of the room.

small_cave.name: Cave
small_cave.description_original: This is a tiny cave with entrances west and north, and a staircase leading down.

tiny_cave.name: Cave
tiny_cave.description_original: This is a tiny cave with entrances west and north, and a dark, forbidding staircase leading down.

cold_passage.name: Cold Passage
cold_passage.description_original: This is a cold and damp corridor where a long east-west passageway turns into a southward path.

narrow_passage.name: Narrow Passage
narrow_passage.description_original: This is a long and narrow corridor where a long north-south passageway briefly narrows even further.

winding_passage.name: Winding Passage
winding_passage.description_original: This is a winding passage. It seems that there are only exits on the east and north.

twisting_passage.name: Twisting Passage
twisting_passage.description_original: This is a winding passage. It seems that there are only exits on the east and north.

atlantis_room.name: Atlantis Room
atlantis_room.description_original: This is an ancient room, long under water. There is an exit to the south and a staircase leading up.

ew_passage.name: East-West Passage
ew_passage.description_original: This is a narrow east-west passageway. There is a narrow stairway leading down at the north end of the room.

round_room.name: Round Room
round_room.description_original: This is a circular stone room with passages in all directions. Several of them have unfortunately been blocked by cave-ins.

deep_canyon.name: Deep Canyon
deep_canyon.description_original: You are on the south edge of a deep canyon. Passages lead off to the east, northwest and southwest. You can hear the sound of flowing water from below.

damp_cave.name: Damp Cave
damp_cave.description_original: This cave has exits to the west and east, and narrows to a crack toward the south. The earth is particularly damp here.

loud_room.name: Loud Room
loud_room.description_original: This is a large room with a ceiling which cannot be detected from the ground. There is a narrow passage from east to west and a stone stairway leading upward. The room is extremely noisy. In fact, it is difficult to hear yourself think.

ns_passage.name: North-South Passage
ns_passage.description_original: This is a high north-south passage, which forks to the northeast.

chasm_room.name: Chasm
chasm_room.description_original: A chasm runs southwest to northeast and the path follows it. You are on the south side of the chasm, where a crack opens into a passage.

entrance_to_hades.name: Entrance to Hades
entrance_to_hades.description_original: You are outside a large gateway, on which is inscribed: 'Abandon every hope all ye who enter here'. The gate is open; through it you can see a desolation, with a pile of mangled corpses in one corner. Thousands of voices, lamenting some hideous fate, can be heard.

land_of_living_dead.name: Land of the Dead
land_of_living_dead.description_original: You have entered the Land of the Living Dead. Thousands of lost souls can be heard weeping and moaning. In the corner are stacked the remains of dozens of previous adventurers less fortunate than yourself. A passage exits to the north.

engravings_cave.name: Engravings Cave
engravings_cave.description_original: You have entered a low cave with passages leading northwest and east.

egypt_room.name: Egyptian Room
egypt_room.description_original: This is a room which looks like an Egyptian tomb. There is an ascending staircase to the west.

dome_room.name: Dome Room
dome_room.description_original: You are at the periphery of a large dome, which forms the ceiling of another room below. Protecting you from a precipitous drop is a wooden railing which circles the dome.

torch_room.name: Torch Room
torch_room.description_original: This is a large room with a prominent doorway leading to a down staircase. To the west is a narrow twisting tunnel, through which is coming a horrible stench. To the south is a narrow tunnel.

north_temple.name: Temple
north_temple.description_original: This is the north end of a large temple. On the east wall is an ancient inscription, probably a prayer in a long-forgotten language. Below the prayer is a staircase leading down. The west wall is solid granite. The exit to the north end of the room is through huge marble pillars.

south_temple.name: Altar
south_temple.description_original: This is the south end of a large temple. In front of you is what appears to be an altar. In one corner is a small hole in the floor which leads into darkness. You probably could not get back up it.

dam_room.name: Dam
dam_room.description_original: You are standing on the top of the Flood Control Dam #3, which was quite a tourist attraction in times far distant. There are paths to the north, south, and west, and a scramble down.

dam_lobby.name: Dam Lobby
dam_lobby.description_original: This room appears to have been the waiting room for groups touring the dam. There are open doorways here to the north and east marked "Private", and there is a path leading south over the top of the dam.

maintenance_room.name: Maintenance Room
maintenance_room.description_original: This is what appears to have been the maintenance room for Flood Control Dam #3. Apparently, this room has been ransacked recently, for most of the valuable equipment is gone. On the wall in front of you is a group of buttons colored blue, yellow, brown, and red. There are doorways to the west and south.

dam_base.name: Dam Base
dam_base.description_original: You are at the base of Flood Control Dam #3, which looms above you and to the north. The river Frigid is flowing by here. Along the river are the White Cliffs which seem to form giant walls stretching from north to south along the shores of the river as it winds its way downstream.

river_1.name: Frigid River
river_1.description_original: You are on the Frigid River in the vicinity of the Dam. The river flows quietly here. There is a landing on the west shore.

river_2.name: Frigid River
river_2.description_original: The river turns a corner here making it impossible to see the Dam. The White Cliffs loom on the east bank and large rocks prevent landing on the west.

river_3.name: Frigid River
river_3.description_original: The river descends here into a valley. There is a narrow beach on the west shore below the cliffs. In the distance a faint rumbling can be heard.

white_cliffs_north.name: White Cliffs Beach
white_cliffs_north.description_original: You are on a narrow strip of beach which runs along the base of the White Cliffs. There is a narrow path heading south along the Cliffs and a tight passage leading west into the cliffs themselves.

white_cliffs_south.name: White Cliffs Beach
white_cliffs_south.description_original: You are on a rocky, narrow strip of beach beside the Cliffs. A narrow path leads north along the shore.

river_4.name: Frigid River
river_4.description_original: The river is running faster here and the sound ahead appears to be that of rushing water. On the east shore is a sandy beach. A small area of beach can also be seen below the cliffs on the west shore.

river_5.name: Frigid River
river_5.description_original: The sound of rushing water is nearly unbearable here. On the east shore is a large landing area.

shore.name: Shore
shore.description_original: You are on the east shore of the river. The water here seems somewhat treacherous. A path travels from north to south here, the south end quickly turning around a sharp corner.

sandy_beach.name: Sandy Beach
sandy_beach.description_original: You are on a large sandy beach on the east shore of the river, which is flowing quickly by. A path runs beside the river to the south here, and a passage is partially buried in sand to the northeast.

sandy_cave.name: Sandy Cave
sandy_cave.description_original: This is a sand-filled cave whose exit is to the southwest.

aragain_falls.name: Aragain Falls
aragain_falls.description_original: You are at the top of Aragain Falls, an enormous waterfall with a drop of about 450 feet. The only path here is on the north end.

on_rainbow.name: On the Rainbow
on_rainbow.description_original: You are on top of a rainbow (I bet you never thought you would walk on a rainbow), with a magnificent view of the Falls. The rainbow travels east-west here.

end_of_rainbow.name: End of Rainbow
end_of_rainbow.description_original: You are on a small, rocky beach on the continuation of the Frigid River past the Falls. The beach is narrow due to the presence of the White Cliffs. The river canyon opens here and sunlight shines in from above. A rainbow crosses over the falls to the east and a narrow path continues to the southwest.

canyon_bottom.name: Canyon Bottom
canyon_bottom.description_original: You are beneath the walls of the river canyon which may be climbable here. The lesser part of the runoff of Aragain Falls flows by below. To the north is a narrow path.

cliff_middle.name: Rocky Ledge
cliff_middle.description_original: You are on a ledge about halfway up the wall of the river canyon. You can see from here that the main flow from Aragain Falls twists along a passage which it is impossible for you to enter. Below you is the canyon bottom. Above you is more cliff, which appears climbable.

canyon_view.name: Canyon View
canyon_view.description_original: You are at the top of the Great Canyon on its west wall. From here there is a marvelous view of the canyon and parts of the Frigid River upstream. Across the canyon, the walls of the White Cliffs join the mighty ramparts of the Flathead Mountains to the east. Following the Canyon upstream to the north, Aragain Falls may be seen, complete with rainbow. The mighty Frigid River flows out from a great dark cavern. To the west and south can be seen an immense forest, stretching for miles around. A path leads northwest. It is possible to climb down into the canyon from here.

mine_entrance.name: Mine Entrance
mine_entrance.description_original: You are standing at the entrance of what might have been a coal mine. The shaft enters the west wall, and there is another exit on the south end of the room.

squeeky_room.name: Squeaky Room
squeeky_room.description_original: You are in a small room. Strange squeaky sounds may be heard coming from the passage at the north end. You may also escape to the east.

bat_room.name: Bat Room
bat_room.description_original: You are in a small room which has doors only to the east and south.

shaft_room.name: Shaft Room
shaft_room.description_original: This is a large room, in the middle of which is a small shaft descending through the floor into darkness below. To the west and the north are exits from this room. Constructed over the top of the shaft is a metal framework to which a heavy iron chain is attached.

smelly_room.name: Smelly Room
smelly_room.description_original: This is a small nondescript room. However, from the direction of a small descending staircase a foul odor can be detected. To the south is a narrow tunnel.

gas_room.name: Gas Room
gas_room.description_original: This is a small room which smells strongly of coal gas. There is a short climb up some stairs and a narrow tunnel leading east.

ladder_top.name: Ladder Top
ladder_top.description_original: This is a very small room. In the corner is a rickety wooden ladder, leading downward. It might be safe to descend. There is also a staircase leading upward.

ladder_bottom.name: Ladder Bottom
ladder_bottom.description_original: This is a rather wide room. On one side is the bottom of a narrow wooden ladder. To the west and the south are passages leaving the room.

dead_end_5.name: Dead End
dead_end_5.description_original: You have come to a dead end in the mine.

timber_room.name: Timber Room
timber_room.description_original: This is a long and narrow passage, which is cluttered with broken timbers. A wide passage comes from the east and turns at the west end of the room into a very narrow passageway. From the west comes a strong draft.

lower_shaft.name: Drafty Room
lower_shaft.description_original: This is a small drafty room in which is the bottom of a long shaft. To the south is a passageway and to the east a very narrow passage. In the shaft can be seen a heavy iron chain.

machine_room.name: Machine Room
machine_room.description_original: This is a large room full of assorted heavy machinery, whirring noisily. The room smells of burned resistors. Along one wall of the room are three buttons which are, respectively, round, triangular, and square. There are doorways to the west and south.

mine_1.name: Coal Mine
mine_1.description_original: This is a nondescript part of a coal mine.

mine_2.name: Coal Mine
mine_2.description_original: This is a nondescript part of a coal mine.

mine_3.name: Coal Mine
mine_3.description_original: This is a nondescript part of a coal mine.

mine_4.name: Coal Mine
mine_4.description_original: This is a nondescript part of a coal mine.

slide_room.name: Slide Room
slide_room.description_original: This is a small chamber, which appears to have been part of a coal mine. On the south wall of the chamber the letters "Granite Wall" are etched in the rock. To the east is a long passage, and there is a steep metal slide twisting downward. To the north is a small opening.
